title: Northern Whispers
description: Northern Whispers is a collection of Helle Gade's three first poetry collection's: Silent Dreams, Nocturnal Embers and Savage Rose. They revolve around all aspects of the authors life such as love, pain, joy, Nordic mythology and much more. The authors own photography accompanies many of the poems in Nocturnal Embers and Savage Rose, enhancing the feel of the poetry.
author: Helle Gade
